eu.wauz.wauzcore.items

Class WauzScrolls

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.WauzScrolls

  • public class WauzScrolls
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for handling the usage of scrolls and socketable items.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Method Detail

      • onScrollItemInteract

        public static void onScrollItemInteract(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent event)
        Handles the usage of right click scrolls. Includes following types: Summoning, Comfort. Removes the scroll item, if successful.
        Parameters:
        event - The interact event.
        See Also:
        For item interactive scrolls..., PetOverviewMenu.addPet(PlayerInteractEvent), WauzPlayerEventHomeChange

      • onScrollItemInteract

        public static void onScrollItemInteract(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event,
                                        java.lang.String itemName)
        Handles the usage of item interactive scrolls, aswell as runes and skillgems. Includes following types: Wisdom, Fortune, Toughness, Regret. Removes the scroll item, if successful.
        Parameters:
        event - The inventory event.
        itemName - The name of the scroll or socketable item.
        See Also:
        For right click scrolls..., WauzIdentifier.identify(InventoryClickEvent, String), ShopBuilder.sell(Player, ItemStack, Boolean), ShopBuilder.repair(Player, ItemStack, Boolean), WauzEquipment.clearAllSockets(InventoryClickEvent), WauzEquipment.insertRune(InventoryClickEvent), WauzEquipment.insertSkillgem(InventoryClickEvent)
